title: Release My Soul (Guilty Crown OST)
lyrics: Oh Take a look in the mirror you look so sad It's so cold like that winter market we used to go I don't cry anymore but I feel so hurt So I don't need you to close to me You don't hear me so you said I don't know why thing have changed since yesterday This could be love again All I need is you Come back, I'm waiting, Anytime The heavy rains come Still I miss days with you I can't look into your face Oh Feeling blue and looking back again Please come back to me To stay with you always You are the world to me, and dreaming on So you can take my sword again for you How do you feel, so fine You're the world to me, and dream on You stole my heart so long ago Oh I release my soul So you feel my song Bb (Si giáng trưởng) 0 1 333 1
